description: A CSS file that defines styles including theme management variables, layout, and design aspects for the application components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application with a responsive design and theme support.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with flexbox layout and background styling.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styles that adapt color based on theme.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes with specific styles.
